ask_groups.ask_description: Customers want to automate email handling to reduce manual forwarding and improve efficiency.
example_phrasing: I would need to automate that because now I'm responsible for the support in terms that I'll forward the message to someone in our team.

ask_groups.ask_description: Customers are looking for the ability to create and use email templates for quicker responses.
example_phrasing: It would be good if I could create templates and just send them.

ask_groups.ask_description: Customers need a system to track email responses and ensure no emails are overlooked.
example_phrasing: We need a way to track how we are responding to emails and ensure nothing slips through the cracks.
Looking for solutions to prevent things from getting dropped and missed.

ask_groups.ask_description: Customers want a platform that can categorize emails based on urgency and type for better management.
example_phrasing: They need a platform that can categorize emails based on urgency and type.
We need a system that categorizes where everything is at in the process.

ask_groups.ask_description: Customers are seeking solutions that combine email management with team collaboration features.
example_phrasing: Looking for a solution that integrates email management and collaboration.

ask_groups.ask_description: Customers want emails to be automatically assigned to specific individuals based on their content.
example_phrasing: We want emails addressed to specific individuals to be automatically assigned to them.
Wants to know if there's a way to auto-assign emails based on their content.

ask_groups.ask_description: Customers are looking for a way to integrate with Shopify.
example_phrasing: The customer expressed a desire to set up a Shopify integration.

ask_groups.ask_description: Customers need forms with dropdowns and conditional elements for accurate ticket submissions.
example_phrasing: Need a form that includes dropdowns and conditional elements to ensure correct ticket submission.

ask_groups.ask_description: Customers are interested in AI functionality to automatically prioritize requests.
example_phrasing: Interested in AI functionality to prioritize requests automatically.

ask_groups.ask_description: Customers want a dashboard that displays various metrics related to email interactions.
example_phrasing: They want a dashboard that shows the count of different types of emails received.

ask_groups.ask_description: Customers need a mechanism to verify that emails are being processed promptly.
example_phrasing: We need a way to have a double check that the emails are getting processed in a timely manner.

ask_groups.ask_name: Reporting on Email Interactions and Team Performance
ask_groups.ask_description: Customers are looking for tools that provide insights into email interactions and the performance of their teams.
example_phrasing: Tools that provide reporting and visibility into email interactions and team performance.

ask_groups.ask_name: Visibility on Ticket Ownership and Status
ask_groups.ask_description: Customers want a system that clearly shows who owns tickets and their current status.
example_phrasing: A system that provides visibility on ticket ownership and status.

ask_groups.ask_name: Clarification on pricing and package details
ask_groups.ask_description: Customers want to understand the pricing structure and what is included in their package.
example_phrasing: Wants to understand pricing and what is included in the package.
Wants to discuss the best case scenario on pricing.

ask_groups.ask_description: Customers are interested in understanding the benefits of longer contract terms.
example_phrasing: What advantages can you offer for a two or three-year contract?

ask_groups.ask_description: Customers seek reassurance that they are making the right choice in their service provider.
example_phrasing: I want to make sure that I'm making the right decision.

ask_groups.ask_name: Ease of Use and Workflow Setup
ask_groups.ask_description: Customers want a platform that is user-friendly and facilitates easy workflow setup.
example_phrasing: Looking for a platform that is easy to use and set up workflows.

ask_groups.ask_description: Customers are inquiring about the inclusion of AI features in their subscription plan.
example_phrasing: Wants to know if AI features are included in the plan.

ask_groups.ask_description: Customers are asking about the ability to access and manage their drafts in a dedicated location.
example_phrasing: Is there like a separate folder that I can just, he can just check all my drafts?

ask_groups.ask_description: Customers are seeking assistance with navigating and understanding personal settings.
example_phrasing: Can you take us through the personal settings?

ask_groups.ask_description: Customers want to integrate various communication channels into their support system.
example_phrasing: Looking for options to add WhatsApp to their support system.
The customer is interested in a platform that integrates phone support natively.

ask_groups.ask_description: Customers are inquiring about the capability to use voice notes in their support interactions.
example_phrasing: They want to know if voice notes can be supported.

ask_groups.ask_description: Customers are looking for ways to categorize queries through a form on their website.
example_phrasing: Is it possible to set up a form on our website to categorize queries?

ask_groups.ask_description: Customers are exploring options to switch email services to enhance support capabilities.
example_phrasing: Exploring the possibility of switching to Google emails to utilize Hiver's full capabilities.
